text: Yvonne from Paris is a 1919 American silent comedy film directed by Emmett J. Flynn and starring Mary Miles Minter, Allan Forrest and Vera Lewis.Guide to the Silent Years of American Cinema p.191 ==Cast== * Mary Miles Minter as Yvonne Halbert * Allan Forrest as Lawrence Bartlett * Vera Lewis as Aunt Marie Provost * J. Barney Sherry as David Marston * Bertram Grassby as Harley Pembroke * Rosemary Theby as Cecile * E. Alyn Warren as Luigi * Jack Farrell as Henri Franey ==References== ==Bibliography== * Donald W. McCaffrey & Christopher P. Jacobs. Guide to the Silent Years of American Cinema. Greenwood Publishing, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1919 films Category:1919 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Emmett J. Flynn Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Yvonne from Paris
